question: This state government launches water ATM Project in city and suburbs.
explanation: West Bengal Panchayat and Rural Development and Public Health Engineering minister Subrata Mukherjee announced the launch of water ATM project to ensure bacteria-free drinking water in schools. Water ATMs are being set up in the city and suburbs of West Bengal. The machines are made in Germany. Mainly, schools and hospitals will be covered under this project. This project is carried out with the help of Japan International Cooperation Agency, the Asian Development Bank and the World Bank.
